caption:
"A metallic possibly pipe-type object with a silver color and cylindrical shape. The smooth surface suggests it is made of metal. Likely part of a plumbing or ventilation system. Located on the ceiling, near recessed lighting fixtures."

"A white ceramic toilet with a standard oval shape. Has a flush mechanism and a seat cover. Designed for sanitary use in bathrooms. Positioned against a tiled wall with adjacent plumbing fixtures."
